entry.title: The Merge Drives Value of ETH Options Past Bitcoin

entry.title: Nomad Bridge Hacked With $45M Stolen
entry.summary: The Nomad bridge is being exploited, with $45M in digital assets stolen so far.

entry.title: CryptoPunk Holders Unfazed By Meebits’ Move To Add Royalties
entry.summary: Yuga Labs has implemented a 5% royalty on secondary sales of Meebits.

entry.title: Yuga Adds Royalties to Meebits, What’s Next?
entry.summary: Remember Meebits? The Larva Labs money machine that raised a then scarcely believable $80m for a collection of voxel PFPs with no discernible utility, no roadmap, just the cachet of being from the same creators as the legendary punks. Meebits were the spur for Bored Ape owners to do everything in their power to raise … Yuga Adds Royalties to Meebits, What’s Next? Read More »
